bibl.title: Homeric Papyri at Oslo, Harvard and Graz University.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: Four papyri containing the Iliad of Homer. - Re-edition of P. Osl. Inv. 1465 (= M.-P.3 607.02; LDAB 113917). I 411-437, 473-480. 2nd cent. CE. - Edition of P. Oxy. IV, 760 descr. (= M.-P.3 761; LDAB 1365), now Graz University. V 715-718, 720-729. 1st cent. CE. - Edition of P. Oxy. IV, 764 descr. (= M.-P.3 823; LDAB 1940), now Harvard University. VIII, 109-123. 3rd cent. CE. - Edition of P. Oxy. III, 554 (= M.-P.3 966; LDAB 1933), now Graz University. XIX 251-259. 3rd cent. CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Oxy. III, 554 descr.; IV, 760 descr.; 764 descr.
Andrzej Mirończuk, Homeric Papyri at Oslo, Harvard and Graz University.
ArchPF 59 (2013) pp. 1-16, 3 figg. coul., 1 pl. coul.

Four papyri containing the Iliad of Homer. - Re-edition of P. Osl. Inv. 1465 (= M.-P.3 607.02; LDAB 113917). I 411-437, 473-480. 2nd cent. CE. - Edition of P. Oxy. IV, 760 descr. (= M.-P.3 761; LDAB 1365), now Graz University. V 715-718, 720-729. 1st cent. CE. - Edition of P. Oxy. IV, 764 descr. (= M.-P.3 823; LDAB 1940), now Harvard University. VIII, 109-123. 3rd cent. CE. - Edition of P. Oxy. III, 554 (= M.-P.3 966; LDAB 1933), now Graz University. XIX 251-259. 3rd cent. CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
